page.title: 17CHILDREN'S GAMES cont'd
page.content: {2.}Write the name of one country in each square.{3.}Place the ball in the middle of the square. (X){4.}One person stands in each square.{5.}One person eg. Italy, shouts out the name of one of remaining countries.{6.} Everyone runs out of their squares except for the person whose country has been called out. eg. France {7.}The person who is in France grabs the ball and shouts "Stop where you are." Everyone stands still.{8.}The person with the ball hits the nearest body with it.eg. England.{9.}If the ball hits England then France colours in 1/4 of England's square.If misses then England fills in 1/4 France's square.{10.}France is now on.{11.}Game continues until everyone's square is filled except one- that one being the winner.
